search_general_talk_academy01/4401_0701_:
Hey there! Thanks for rolling by to have a chat
with your mate—the Ball Guy!

Since you’ve been studying so hard,
here’s something to keep you going!
Go ahead, pick a ball!
search_general_talk_academy01/4402_0701_:
I’ll take you on. Tell me. Uncle Grimsley is going
to flip a coin.
Will it be heads or tails?

If somebody wins a battle, then without doubt,
someone else has lost the battle.
search_general_talk_academy01/4403_0701_:
Hey, would you mind joining Onix and me
for some training?

While we’ve been searching for fossils, we’ve also
been training by breaking rocks!
That was some great training! Thanks a lot!
search_general_talk_academy01/4404_0701_: Hmm, I’m wondering what to do for my next vid...

Got any ideas that’ll make my numbers rise like a
super-fast Eelektross crawlin’ out of the ocean?
search_general_talk_academy01/4404_0301_:
How about, “Can You Eat That?
World’s Weirdest Foods!”
search_general_talk_academy01/4404_0401_:
I see, I see! Guess it’s time for me to take on
something riskier, huh!
search_general_talk_academy01/4404_0302_:
How about, “Epic School Challenge:
Can I Ace EVERY Subject?”
search_general_talk_academy01/4404_0402_:
Did you just drop that crazy idea like it’s
no biggie? You li’l evil mastermind!
search_general_talk_academy01/4404_0701_:
Anywho, thanks for the brilliant idea! I’m gonna be
streamin’ a new vid soon, so quiver in excitement,
friendo!
search_general_talk_academy01/4405_0701_:
I’m heading out to do some training, but where do
you think I should go?
search_general_talk_academy01/4405_0401_:
Right, of course! Dragons make you think of
mountains, don’t they?
search_general_talk_academy01/4405_0402_: The beach, huh... I bet I can find Clair there!
search_general_talk_academy01/4405_0701_:
Thanks for the suggestion! Why don’t you come
with?
search_general_talk_academy01/4406_0701_:
I’m excited to make curry in our next cooking
class!

Oh, by the way, do you prefer sweet curry
or spicy?
search_general_talk_academy01/4406_0401_: OK! Let’s add plenty of Pecha Berry, then!
search_general_talk_academy01/4406_0402_: OK! Let’s add plenty of Figy Berry, then!
search_general_talk_academy01/4406_0701_:
I’m glad I know what you like now! Let’s make
some delicious curry together!
search_general_talk_academy01/4407_0701_: Hey there! I’d like to ask you a question.
Which color do you like more, black or white?
search_general_talk_academy01/4407_0401_:
Good to know! In that case, I’ll give you a gift
from Reshiram!
search_general_talk_academy01/4407_0402_:
Good to know! In that case, I’ll give you a gift
from Zekrom!
search_general_talk_academy01/4407_0701_: I hope we’ll continue to be friends!
search_general_talk_academy01/4408_0701_:
Hello there! Have a moment? I’ve a blue box and
a red box, and I’d like to give you one.
search_general_talk_academy01/4408_0402_: Oh, you’re choosing that one, huh.
search_general_talk_academy01/4408_0701_: So, was it what you hoped?
search_general_talk_academy01/4409_0701_:
Hello there! Great to see you! My Pokémon lecture
is about to begin!
That concludes today’s lecture! Well, how was it?
search_general_talk_academy01/4409_1101_:
VERY helpful, as it covered what you needed to
study for tomorrow’s class!

a good review, as you already learned the content
in another class!
search_general_talk_academy01/4410_0701_: Hey! Are you ready for the exam?
We can do some special training if you’d like!
Let’s wrap it up for today! Well done!
search_general_talk_academy01/4410_1101_: Thanks to Blue, you feel a lot more confident!
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_1101_: Who do you want to talk to during break?
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_0701_: Alola! Want to chat for a bit?
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_1101_: You chatted with Lillie about the flowers!
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_0701_:
Oh, you came to see me? There’s something I
wanted to talk to you about...
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_1101_: You chatted with Marley about school!
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_0701_:
Hey! Break’s pretty short, isn’t it. Let’s chat for
a bit!
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_1101_:
You chatted briefly with Adaman about recent
events!
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_0701_:
Hey! One of the teachers taught me something.
Did you know that bug Pokémon are...
search_general_talk_academy01/4411_1101_: Bugsy told you all about bug Pokémon!
search_general_talk_academy01/4412_1101_: Who do you want to talk to during break?
You talked with Hau while eating malasadas!
search_general_talk_academy01/4412_0701_:
Hmm... I feel like I could come up with a great
piece of art just by looking at you!

Hey! Perfect timing! Could you help me with my
studies? Pretty please?
search_general_talk_academy01/4412_1101_: You helped Whitney! She was very grateful!
search_general_talk_academy01/4412_0701_:
Hey, sorry to ask, but could you help me prepare
for my next class? How about I buy you some
bread as thanks?
search_general_talk_academy01/4412_1101_:
You learned a lot about teaching while helping
Sonia prepare!
search_general_talk_academy01/4413_1101_: Who do you want to talk to during break?
search_general_talk_academy01/4413_0701_: Hey, you. What’re you doing loafing around here?
search_general_talk_academy01/4413_1101_:
You caught Nanu up on recent events,
and he bought you a juice!
search_general_talk_academy01/4413_0701_: Hey! Care for a quick battle during break?
search_general_talk_academy01/4413_1101_:
You had a fun battle with Hilbert, even though it
was short!
search_general_talk_academy01/4413_0701_:
Oh, what’s up? You here to see me, the great
Raihan?
search_general_talk_academy01/4413_1101_:
You chatted with the ever-popular Raihan,
and people started gathering around you!
search_general_talk_academy01/4414_1101_: Who do you want to talk to during break?
search_general_talk_academy01/4414_0701_: ’Sup! You after somethin’, or am I wrong?
search_general_talk_academy01/4414_1101_: You chatted with Mela about her recent paintings!
search_general_talk_academy01/4414_0701_: Um... There’s something I’d like to share...
search_general_talk_academy01/4414_1101_:
You and Jasmine shared info about great
food spots.
You played with Acerola during break!
